scripts.start: hexo clean && hexo generate && hexo server
scripts.update: echo =========[ Git Fetching ]========= && git.exe fetch && echo =========[ Git Pulling ]========= && git.exe pull && echo =========[ Complete ]=========
scripts.dp: echo ---------------- [ Start Commit and Push ] ---------------- && npm run git && echo ---------------- [ Start Updating Html ] ---------------- && hexo clean && hexo generate && echo ---------------- [ Start Deploying ] ---------------- && hexo deploy && echo --------------------!= Push All File =!--------------------
scripts.fdp: echo ---------------- [ Start Updating Html ] ---------------- && hexo clean && hexo generate && echo ---------------- [ Start Deploying ] ---------------- && hexo deploy && echo --------------------!= Push All File =!--------------------
scripts.dps: echo ---------------- [ Start Commit and Push ] ---------------- && npm run git && echo ---------------- [ Start Updating Html ] ---------------- && hexo clean && hexo generate && echo ---------------- [ Start Deploying ] ---------------- && hexo deploy && echo --------------------!= Push All File =!-------------------- && echo ! Now starting the Server ! && hexo server
